summary: This document is an email from Mark L. Epstein, dated May 26, 2020, forwarding a previous email from May 24, 2020, to Stacey Richman. The subject references 'text threats' and includes a forwarded message with a timestamp of May 19, 2020, at 04:15 am, stating 'Wrong number'.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein communicated with Stacey Richman about 'text threats' in May 2020.
The correspondence references a specific incident on May 19, 2020, at 04:15 am involving a text threat and a 'Wrong number' response.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting the communication may be relevant to the broader investigation.
